channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.description:

item.title: Empty boxes and other rubbish on Stanbury Road for weeks, 1st December
item.description:
Hi This rubbish has been on Stanbury Road - just behind Julian’s shop, off Brayards Road, for weeks. The pile keeps growing. Thanks

item.title: Rubbish outside 24 Hazelbourne Road, 1st December
item.description:
Again - reporting this - bag of domestic rubbish outside 24 Hazelbourne Road. This was reported over a week ago. Surely if this street was being cleared / picked according to schedule this would have been removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hazelbourne Road, Clapham, Greater London

item.title: Fly tipping sacks rubbish & household items, 1st December

item.title: Constantly scatter litter from animals, 1st December
